channel.title: periscope on cc
channel.description: Recent content in periscope on cc

item.title: Twice 4th Anniv Medley (live)
item.description: 🎹 Twice we FANCY YOU (medley) #Twice4thAnniversary #TWICEMakesMeFeelSpecial #Twice #piano #live https://t.co/EZKzmqV0gK — Ryu (@poly2d) October 20, 2019 Excerpts FANCY (~0:00) What is Love? (~2:00) Like OOH-AHH (~3:28) Dance the Night Away (~4:57) Heart Shaker - outro (~6:45) Notes I stuck to the A-side tracks for this medley. I just used the songs that came to my mind, but if I were to retroactively state a reason for each:

item.title: Bios - Guilty Crown (live)
item.description: 🎹 Guilty Crown - βios ギルティクラウン OST #Piano #Music https://t.co/mhtr6ELk5O — Ryu (@poly2d) October 14, 2019 Notes Based on the Animenz arrangement Video: https://youtu.be/DcjUOdeq6G8 Sheet: https://sheet.host/sheet/1uMLWW Original: https://youtu.be/UMCka_vXtL4 The soundtrack of the Guilty Crown series was what led me to find Animenz on youtube in early 2012. I found his cover of ßios. I had some lessons during my childhood, but by this time I had absolutely forgotten how to play piano.

item.title: 千本桜 / Senbonzakura (live)
item.description: 🎹 千本桜 / Senbonzakura live piano #初音ミク生誕祭2019 #HatsuneMikuBirthday https://t.co/HNJVg866Mn — Ryu (@poly2d) September 1, 2019 Notes Original: https://youtu.be/P6C3szts5C4 This live of Senbonzakura was for a special occasion: 13th anniversary of Hatsune Miku! I have fond memories of this song because my roommates and I played it a lot in Taiko no Tatsujin. I borrowed some small nuances and snippets from two of my favorite covers of this song (listed below) - can you spot them?

item.title: NGE Medley (live)
item.description: This was the first piano post I shared on Twitter! The hype in this day and age was how Neon Genesis Evangelion was coming to Netflix (at least for a subset of the internet 🙂). That led me to revisit some of the theme songs from the franchise. 🎹ネトフリにエヴァ来たらしいのでOPとか弾いてみる/ Songs from the anime Neon Genesis Evangelion (live piano) #evangelion https://t.co/0D1wohnbiB — Ryu (@poly2d) June 22, 2019 Excerpts 残酷な天使のテーゼ / Cruel Angel’s Thesis (TV Series OP) (Transition) [SPOILER WARNING] Ep 19 初号機が暴走する時のBGM / Unit-1 goes berserk Fly me to the moon (TV Series ED) Beautiful world (Rebuild 1.
